description.en: TUSC, The Universal Settlement Coin, is a cryptocurrency-based payment system with ultra-low fees for retailers, featuring accounts that can never be shut down due to politics. TUSC is a decentralized, open-source, non-ICO, and community run project. Decision making for TUSC is done by the community though a blockchain-based voting system.  TUSC was built on a delegated proof of stake (DPOS) blockchain.
